name: swarmjs
description: Simulation of a distributed multi-robot collision avoidance algorithm based on the concept of Buffered Voronoi Cells (BVC)*.\ An algorithm for deadlock prediction, deadlock recovery, and deadlock recovery success prediction is proposed and implemented.\ Deadlock avoidance with right-hand heuristics is also implemented for comparison.

scripts.postinstall: (cd src/client && npm install) && (cd src/common && npm install) && (cd src/scenes && npm install)
